description: Students consider in depth some of Shakespeare's most popular plays and also explore some of the less-frequently studied classics. Students examine a wide range of genres and types of plays, view recorded productions, and attend performances when available. Prerequisites: ENGL 185 plus at least two English courses at level II, or permission of the instructor.
name: Shakespeare
prerequisites: Prerequisites: ENGL 185 plus at least two English courses at level II, or permission of the instructor.
